Research

Research Projects

A dictionary based learning technique to reconstruct the orientation field in latent fingerprint images.
Implemented an algorithm to construct a dictionary of fingerprints in a region wise manner and use the dictionary to correct the orientation Field in latent image. [GitHub]
Tags: Matlab

A new Kernel-based structural similarity score to compute the matching score for latent fingerprint matching.
The approach was more robust to invariance such as scale change and rotation in the input images [GitHub]
Tags: Matlab

An automatic technique for evaluating answers to complex questions based on n-gram co-occurrences between machine output and a human-generated answer key
Tags: Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning
